column1: Our economy is still growing in the midst of COVID-19. Kudos to these entrepreneurs for their perseverance.  https://t.co/quiOYHRUS4
China withheld information that could have saved countless American lives. They must be held accountable for their egregious handling of the Coronavirus.  https://t.co/Wzo3jc1Hsg

The time is now to bring relief to our country but Senate Democrats blocked the $300 billion COVID-19 stimulus package. Democrats should stop playing political games with relief for American small businesses. https://t.co/vUJ4BOmLN5

The Abbott $5 rapid COVID-19 test is a huge win for American innovation. Tens of millions affordable tests will be ready this month. Well done to Abbott & the FDA on this partnership that will help our communities. https://t.co/2MLPu5aD4n

Democrats in Washington blocked COVID-19 relief for millions of Americans while demanding a far-left wish list. Democrats again chose partisanship and a radical agenda over results for the American people. https://t.co/0EYnyDQIFk
The @SBAgov has helped many #NC10 small businesses during #COVID19. Thanks for your leadership @SBAJovita.  https://t.co/BSgd7jN4Y1
Thank you to the Trump Administration for assisting our health centers in North Carolina expand COVID-19 testing with over $12 million in funding.  https://t.co/4Yplg5jtY5

The inaction & deception of the Communist Chinese regime is responsible for the spread of the Coronavirus. It is unconscionable that this authoritarian gov't continues to target our intellectual property this time in pursuit of #COVID19 vaccine research.https://t.co/3YACUbD7mL
The CDC’s website provides great information and answers all of your questions on #COVID19:  https://t.co/STIaAkN1AH

Joined @CNBC to discuss safely reopening our economy. There is a right & safe way to do this. We must be pragmatic and ensure we have regional state and local plans in place. #COVID19 https://t.co/hZ8AUEGFva

The Chinese government willfully withheld information about the coronavirus for days risking the lives of millions around the world. This communist regime must not be trusted.  https://t.co/6egH62YoXi
Grateful for the Trump administration stepping up in big ways to defend Americans from #COVID19.  https://t.co/4s5EKM0H3h
Incredible to watch our nation come together to combat #COVID19.  https://t.co/VXkU9xUsIf
Thankful for the @NCNationalGuard and for their selflessness in #COVID19 aid NC alongside @NCPublicSafety @NCEmergency and @NCDHHS.  https://t.co/KayothkvFx
Learn how to protect yourselves and those around you from #COVID19.  https://t.co/8SUhliVqfj

Proud Congress was able to put aside political differences and take swift action to deliver relief for American families & small businesses in this challenging time. I will keep fighting to help North Carolina families get through this. #COVID19 https://t.co/lxnsrmoaGG

Anxiously awaiting the day where we can fully move forward with our nation’s economic life but for the time being I think we all understand we can’t put more people at risk of exposure from #COVID19.  https://t.co/LAaJ2BmQDQ
North Carolinians -- Please utilize 211 for all information pertaining to #COVID19.   You can also text COVIDNC to 898211 to get up-to-date alerts from NC.  https://t.co/h4iDJukoVd
Now more than ever please be aware of hackers who may be trying to take advantage of #COVID19 & violate your privacy and financial security.  https://t.co/iUOmHyBTQY
North Carolinians -- Please utilize the North Carolina #COVID19 helpline by calling 866-462-3821. You can utilize this hotline to report symptoms tests and to ask any questions.
Grateful for the service and leadership from President Trump Vice President Pence Dr. Fauci and the rest of the White House Coronavirus Task Force. https://t.co/Mq1WRfpaTg
Please continue to check the CDC’s website for the latest information on #COVID19. As always if you are feeling ill please stay home & seek medical attention. https://t.co/STIaAkN1AH
We are working to ensure agencies have the resources they need to tackle #COVID19 head on.   https://t.co/u5mjxy7yNY
Continuing to pray for everyone across North Carolina who has been affected by #COVID19. A special thank you to our healthcare professionals working diligently to combat this threat.
In the midst of #COVID19 keep an eye out for updates from the @CDCgov on Twitter Facebook and their website for the most up-to-date news.  https://t.co/STIaAkN1AH
